response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, we're confident it's worth more than $10,000 to you. Considering this, I propose a special introductory offer of $11,500 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 11500}
